external_games.name: Tri Focuser: Outside the Traditional World

name: Tri Focuser: Outside the Traditional World
storyline: Aya Shameimaru and Hatate Himekaidou are tasked by their boss, Tenmu Suitokuin, to report on the doings of the Angels (newly settled from the events of The Last Comer). Eventually, they receive news that the Sword of Kusanagi has gone missing once again, and they set out to find the culprit (as it will make for a juicy scoop).
summary: A Touhou fangame developed by Shijimi Nono, Ido and Raichu, with gameplay similar to the official Touhou games Shoot the Bullet and Double Spoiler. Much like those two, this game also brings back a variety of characters, but here they are from games developed by the Kaisendo circle prior to this game's release: The Last Comer, Mystical Power Plant, Riverbed Soul Saver, and Book of Star Mythology.
